title: Help with server transfer
body:
this morning i made the transfer from EUNE to EUW. But after transfer was made, 
my name looks like this IS126b80d98 and so on the new server witch i can log into fine. 
wanted to open a ticked about that on support. But couldnÂ´t. Since i have to log into the web-site to do so. But my emil is not Verified? 
Yet when i do log into account info. it says that it is? And no email was send to me about it being verified.
So i try to change the emil into something else, another email that i have, but now it says my password is incorrect? 
the same that i use to log into the game launcher. "witch works, by the way" and trying to change the password is the same. Its incorrect... 

what the flying fuck is going on? 

Please help.

replies.body: Were you previously on EUW in the past?  Your username would be reverted to the original username, and the summoner name may have become inactive.  Verifying your email, though, should not reset your password.  If this is still an issue, you can reach out to us directly via support@riotgames.com.  We'll be able to directly reply back to you there and assist with recovery.
thank you for the reply, will try what i can for a few more hours if not a day. If nothing improves, i will reach out via the mail. Thanks again.
